metadata.title: CVE-2023-40170 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: jupyter-server is the backend for Jupyter web applications. Impropercross-site credential checks on `/files/` URLs could allow exposure ofcertain file contents, or accessing files when opening untrusted files via"Open image in new tab". This issue has been addressed in commit`87a49272728` which has been included in release `2.7.2`. Users are advisedto upgrade. Users unable to upgrade may use the lower performance`--ContentsManager.files_handler_class=jupyter_server.files.handlers.FilesHandler`,which implements the correct checks.

criterions.comment: jupyter-server package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
